com.flowpowered.caustic.api.data

Class Uniform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.caustic.api.data.Uniform
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Uniform.BooleanUniform, Uniform.FloatArrayUniform, Uniform.FloatUniform, Uniform.IntUniform, Uniform.Matrix2Uniform, Uniform.Matrix3Uniform, Uniform.Matrix4Uniform, Uniform.Vector2ArrayUniform, Uniform.Vector2Uniform, Uniform.Vector3ArrayUniform, Uniform.Vector3Uniform, Uniform.Vector4Uniform

    public abstract class Uniform
extends Object
    Represents a shader uniform, which has a name and a value.
